alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Johnson County through 330 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Dullknife Reservoir, or 18 miles south of Buffalo, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 280 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 54 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
